title: kALi banda
sahitya:
kALi banda kaiyalli tUri koLLiro 


anupallavi

  bAya mucca bEDi nArAyaNana neneyiro


caraNam 1    nityavilla nEmavilla matte dna dharmavilla vyarttavAgi keDede puruSOttamana neneyiro
    caraNam 2    kaddu pusiyanADi apra buddhiyinda keDalu bEDi buddhivantarAgi aniruddhanannu neneyiro
    caraNam 3    bhakti koDuva mukti koDuva matte sAyujya koDuva kartu namma purandara viTTalanna neneyiro
